name.en: Seminar on Human Resource Management Theory
name.ch: 人力資源管理理論專題

goal.en: This course will Introduce the application of psychology in HRM to students by reading, presenting, and discussing relevant past and current academic papers and news on related topics.
goal.ch: 本課程將通過閱讀、報告和討論相關主題的過去和當前學術論文和新聞，向學生介紹心理學在人力資源管理中的應用。
